title: Contact
description: Contact Fabrizio Maffoni for an astorlogical session
heading: Contact
paragraph:
The session will be held via Zoom or Google Meet. 
Birthplace and birth time are important information for a precise birth chart analysis, please write me an email filling up the following form or contact me on Whatsapp +33647544323 to schedule a consultation.

Individual session €100
Synastry session €180
